review_title: Memorial is a great place to work when fully staffed. Family oriented, employee perks. Come work with us!
pros: Family oriented, professional staff, employee incentives and perks. Employers work with you on your schedule. Staff is friendly and easy to work with, good team players. Everyone loves what they are doing.
cons: Pay isn't the best and the hospital is understaffed.

job_title: Customer Service Representative in Lufkin, TX
pros: lots of good people who I worked with for years; hard working caring people
cons: Memorial has gone thru a lot of changes..and the morale is really bad
